Trump urges China to reveal all about origin of COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737008 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/737008/trump-urges-china-to-reveal-all-about-origin-of-covid-19/story/ US President Donald Trump urged China on Tuesday to be transparent about the origins of the novel coronavirus outbreak that has killed more than a quarter of a million people since it started in the Chinese city of Wuhan late last year. Wed, 06 May 2020 02:32:51 +0800
Alamin ang mga kakaibang paraan ng Baguio City para maipatupad ang social distancing tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737006 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737006/alamin-ang-mga-kakaibang-paraan-ng-baguio-city-para-maipatupad-ang-social-distancing/story/ Ang Baguio City ang kinilalang modelong lungsod sa paglaban sa nakamamatay na COVID-19. Ngayon naman, kung magkakaroon din ng modelong lungsod sa implementasyon ng social distancing, tiyak na hindi rin magpapahuli ang City of Pines. Wed, 06 May 2020 01:31:57 +0800
Cyprus to prosecute 15 cops for 'blunder' over serial killer case tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737004 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/737004/cyprus-to-prosecute-15-police-for-blunder-over-serial-killer-case/story/ Fifteen Cyprus police officers face criminal prosecution for botching any search for seven missing foreign women and children who were victims of a serial killer, officials said Tuesday. Wed, 06 May 2020 01:16:37 +0800
Remdesivir may be approved in Japan this week - health minister tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737002 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/737002/remdesivir-may-be-approved-in-japan-this-week-health-minister/story/ Gilead Sciences Inc's antiviral drug remdesivir may be approved in Japan for domestic COVID-19 patients when the health ministry's review board is held on Thursday, Japanese Health Minister Katsunobu Kato said. Wed, 06 May 2020 00:30:38 +0800
Attacks on press freedom persist despite pandemic - CEGP tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737000 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737000/attacks-on-press-freedom-persist-despite-pandemic-cegp/story/ Human rights violations and attacks on press freedom persist in the country despite the coronavirus pandemic, the College Editors Guild of the Philippines (CEGP) said Tuesday. Wed, 06 May 2020 00:03:24 +0800
Caloocan mom nabbed for forcing kids to perform sexual acts online tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736996 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/736996/caloocan-mom-nabbed-for-forcing-kids-to-perform-sexual-acts-online/story/ The Philippine National Police-Women and Children Protection Center (PNP-WCPC) and the National Bureau of Investigation Anti-Human Trafficking Division (NBI-AHTRAD) arrested a 41-year-old woman in Caloocan City for allegedly forcing her three children to perform sexual acts on webcam for paying customers. Tue, 05 May 2020 23:41:50 +0800
Social distancing projects in Baguio City are unique, colorful tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736991 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/736991/social-distancing-projects-in-baguio-city-are-unique-colorful/story/ Baguio City, one of UNESCO's creative cities, has turned implemented a unique project to ensure that residents observe social distancing or physical distancing as part of efforts to curb the spread of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). Tue, 05 May 2020 23:29:05 +0800
Radio reporter, patay sa pamamaril sa Dumaguete City tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736994 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/736994/radio-reporter-patay-sa-pamamaril-sa-dumaguete-city/story/ Isang radio reporter ang patay matapos barilin sa Barangay Daro, Dumaguete City sa Negros Oriental nitong Martes ng gabi. Tue, 05 May 2020 23:22:43 +0800
Robredo on ABS-CBN: Free flow of information saves lives tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736992 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736992/robredo-on-abs-cbn-free-flow-of-information-saves-lives/story/ Vice President Leni Robredo stressed that the country s moves to combat the coronavirus are dependent on the flow of accurate and timely information. “This free flow of information literally saves lives. Closing down ABS-CBN costs lives, on top of unnecessarily burdening the thousands who will lose their jobs,” she said. Tue, 05 May 2020 23:10:09 +0800
UP eyes release of UPCAT results within May tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736990 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736990/up-eyes-release-of-upcat-results-within-may/story/ The University of the Philippines (UP) seeks to release the results of its admission exams within the month despite delays caused by the community quarantine. Tue, 05 May 2020 22:51:45 +0800
DFA: Walang bagong naitalang kaso ng Pinoy sa abroad na pumanaw dahil sa COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736989 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/736989/dfa-walang-bagong-naitalang-kaso-ng-pinoy-sa-abroad-na-pumanaw-dahil-sa-covid-19/story/ Nakapagtala ng 48 panibagong kaso ng COVID-19 sa mga Pinoy na nasa abroad para sa kabuuang bilang na 1,867, ayon sa datos ng Department of Foreign Affairs. Ang maganda umanong balita, hindi nadagdagan ang bilang ng mga pumanaw dahil sa komplikasyon na dulot ng virus. Tue, 05 May 2020 22:46:50 +0800
COVID-19 cases in Asia reach more than 250,000 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736988 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/736988/covid-19-cases-in-asia-reach-more-than-250-000/story/ Cases of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Asia rose to a quarter of a million on Tuesday, according to a Reuters tally, driven by outbreaks in Singapore, Pakistan and India, even as China, South Korea and Japan significantly slowed the spread of the disease. Tue, 05 May 2020 22:46:11 +0800
Radio reporter shot dead in Dumaguete City tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736985 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/736985/radio-reporter-shot-dead-in-dumaguete-city/story/ A radio reporter was shot dead by in Barangay Daro, Dumaguete City in the province of Negros Oriental on Tuesday evening. Tue, 05 May 2020 22:34:35 +0800
Ex-cop na may dalang mga alak sa van, 'di tumigil sa checkpoint at nagpaputok pa sa humabol na mga pulis tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736972 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/736972/ex-cop-na-may-dalang-mga-alak-sa-van-di-tumigil-sa-checkpoint-at-nagpaputok-pa-sa-humabol-na-mga-pulis/story/ Nauwi sa barilan ang hindi pagtigil ng isang dating pulis na sakay ng kaniyang van at kasama pa ang anak sa isang checkpoint sa Quezon City. Nang maabutan ng mga awtoridad, natuklasan ang kahon-kahon na alak sa sasakyan. Tue, 05 May 2020 21:57:52 +0800
Presidential yacht welcomes COVID-19 patients tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736981 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736981/presidential-yacht-welcomes-covid-19-patients/story/ Presidential yacht BRP Ang Pangulo has opened its doors to coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) patients after it was converted into a floating quarantine facility, the Philippine Navy said Tuesday. Tue, 05 May 2020 21:42:42 +0800
